entities.name: the Prime Minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is mentioned as a person who receives a message from the portrait of Fudge. The description mentions that he is waiting for a telephone call from the president.

entities.name: Fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as a minister who sends an urgent message to the Prime Minister through his portrait.

entities.name: the president
entities.description: The president is mentioned as someone from whom the Prime Minister is expecting a telephone call.

entities.name: Mr Fudge
entities.description: Mr Fudge is another name for the minister who sends an urgent message to the Prime Minister through his portrait.

relationships.description: The Prime Minister receives a message from Fudge's portrait.
The Prime Minister is waiting for a telephone call from the president.
Fudge sends an urgent message to the Prime Minister through his portrait.
The little man in the portrait arranges for the president to forget to call the Prime Minister.
